The video was published on a Tamil: language Facebook page on August 8, 2019, and has been viewed over 26,000 times and shared over 1,900 times.
The video was accompanied by a caption i: which translates to English as: "Due to Indian occupation of Kashmir, hundreds of thousands of Kashmiri people took to the streets yesterday to release their land from India... Since Indian media concealed such a big rally, one of the Kashmiris has requested this video to be shared with the world."
A reverse image search on Google found a: dedicated to the funeral of Kashmiri rebel Burhan Wani.
